== XChat-GNOME ==

XChat-GNOME is a highly useable IRC (Internet Relay Chat) client.

== Key Features ==

* Considered more usable for beginners than XChat

== Screenshot ==

<nowiki>[[File:scrn-xchat-gnome.jpg]]</nowiki>

== Installation ==

* Via '''<nowiki>[[Synaptic|Synaptic Package Manager]]</nowiki>'''
* Via apt-get
<pre>
sudo apt-get install xchat-gnome
</pre>

== Hints and Tips ==

* To register your nickname:
<pre>
/msg nickserv register <your-password>
</pre>

* To associate your email address with your nickname (in case you lose your password):
<pre>
/msg NickServ set email your_email@address.org
</pre>
